Stranger Things Fan Tribute ğŸš²ğŸ’¡
Welcome to Hawkins. This is an immersive, interactive fan website dedicated to the Stranger Things universe, featuring an 80s neon aesthetic and interactive elements.
ğŸ”´ LIVE DEMO:https://jeessunny.github.io/Stranger-things-website-/ 
ğŸ¤– Made with Google Gemini
This entire project was designed and coded using Google Gemini.
 * Code Generation: 100% of the HTML, Tailwind CSS, and JavaScript logic was generated by Gemini.
 * Design Concept: The layout, color palette (Stranger Red & Upside Down Black), and interactive "Alphabet Wall" logic were conceptualized and implemented via AI prompts.
âœ¨ Features
 * The Upside Down: An immersive HTML5 Canvas background simulating floating spores/particles.
 * Interactive Alphabet Wall: Type a secret message in the input box, and Joyce's Christmas lights will light up to spell it out!
 * The Hive Mind: Dedicated sections for the series' iconic villains:
   * The Mind Flayer ğŸ•·ï¸
   * Vecna ğŸ•°ï¸
   * Demogorgon â˜£ï¸
   * Demodog ğŸ¾
 * Retro Aesthetic: 80s-inspired typography, neon glow effects, and a vintage wallpaper theme.
 * Mobile Responsive: Fully functional on smartphones and desktops.
ğŸ› ï¸ Technologies Used
 * HTML5
 * Tailwind CSS (via CDN for styling)
 * Vanilla JavaScript (for the particle system and light logic)
 * FontAwesome (for iconic visuals)
ğŸš€ How to Run Locally
 * Download or clone this repository.
 * Open the index.html file in any web browser (Chrome, Edge, Safari, etc.).
 * Enjoy! No installation or build process is required.
